name: 桃源 The Depth
description:
桃源 The Depth 

This is a level design made with Knytt Stories. The setting of this level is set in a mysterious hidden place called "桃源·taoyuan"; it is a place inspired by an old poem written in Chinese. 

Stumbled across in the Taoyuan, the player will be able to explore 10+ designed rooms, solve puzzles, and adventure along.  From gliding through the waterfall to carefully escaping from the killer bugs, this level takes you on a ride of cute graphics and a challenge! 

Basic Controls:

L&R Arrow Keys : Move

S: Jump (double click to double jump) 

D: Umbrella (when acquired)
